{{ cards.name }}

  • {{ cards.nationality }}
  • {{ cards.position }}
  • {{ cards.club }}
 import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Card } from 'src/app/models/card'; import { FutApiService } from 'src/app/service/fut-api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-fut-list', templateUrl: './fut-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./fut-list.component.scss'] }) export class FutListComponent implements OnInit{ public cards: Card[] = []; constructor(private futApiService: FutApiService){ } ngOnInit() { this.futApiService.getCards().subscribe(res => { this.cards = res; }); } }
